original_solution_mapping.L1: Bucket A has 10 more seeds than bucket B: so there are 10 seeds + 30 seeds = <<10+30=40>>40 seeds in bucket A.
original_solution_mapping.L2: Bucket A and bucket B have 40 seeds + 30 seeds = <<40+30=70>>70 seeds together.
original_solution_mapping.L3: If there are 100 seeds in all the buckets, then bucket C has 100 seeds - 70 seeds = <<100-70=30>>30 seeds.

original_function_code:
def solve():
    """Index: 4946.
    Returns: the number of seeds in bucket C.
    """
    # L1
    more_seeds_A_than_B = 10 # ten more seeds in bucket A than in bucket B
    seeds_in_B = 30 # bucket B has 30 seeds
    seeds_in_A = more_seeds_A_than_B + seeds_in_B

    # L2
    seeds_in_A_and_B = seeds_in_A + seeds_in_B

    # L3
    total_seeds = 100 # 100 seeds
    seeds_in_C = total_seeds - seeds_in_A_and_B

    # FA
    answer = seeds_in_C
    return answer

logical_steps.solution_line_template: Bucket A has {more_seeds_A_than_B} more seeds than bucket B: so there are {more_seeds_A_than_B} seeds + {seeds_in_B} seeds = <<{more_seeds_A_than_B}+{seeds_in_B}={seeds_in_A}>>{seeds_in_A} seeds in bucket A.
Bucket A and bucket B have {seeds_in_A} seeds + {seeds_in_B} seeds = <<{seeds_in_A}+{seeds_in_B}={seeds_in_A_and_B}>>{seeds_in_A_and_B} seeds together.
If there are {total_seeds} seeds in all the buckets, then bucket C has {total_seeds} seeds - {seeds_in_A_and_B} seeds = <<{total_seeds}-{seeds_in_A_and_B}={seeds_in_C}>>{seeds_in_C} seeds.

flawed_nl_reconstruction.L1: Bucket A has 30 more seeds than bucket B: so there are 30 seeds + 30 seeds = <<30+30=60>>60 seeds in bucket A.
flawed_nl_reconstruction.L2: Bucket A and bucket B have 60 seeds + 30 seeds = <<60+30=90>>90 seeds together.
flawed_nl_reconstruction.L3: If there are 100 seeds in all the buckets, then bucket C has 100 seeds - 90 seeds = <<100-90=10>>10 seeds.

explanation: Input misrepresentation. The value for 'seeds_in_B' (30) was used instead of 'more_seeds_A_than_B' (10).
